sense.def:
Sadje ali žito, ki je
ripe
, je zraslo dovolj in je primerno, da ga pojemo ali požanjemo.

seg.quote: The pears are heavy and ripe.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
ripe for a change
, je pripravljeno na spremembo.

seg.quote: Our people are ripe for freedom.
The nation was ripe for collapse.

sense.def:
Izraz
the time is ripe
pomeni, da je prišel primeren čas za določen dogodek.

seg.quote: The time was ripe to break his silence.

sense.def:
Kdor živi
to a ripe old age
, je že zelo star.
